Episodes.Title: Fun Run
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael accidentally runs over Meredith in the parking lot, and his guilt causes him to organize a 5K run for her. Dwight and Angela have a falling-out after he kills her cat, and Jim and Pam's relationship is discovered.

Episodes.Title: Dunder Mifflin Infinity
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael feels threatened when Ryan returns to the Scranton office to share his ideas about the future of Dunder Mifflin. Jim and Pam's relationship is shared with the entire office, while Angela and Dwight's relationship is on the...

Episodes.Title: Launch Party
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: The Dunder Mifflin Infinity website is launching and Michael is excited about going to the big launch party in New York while Angela plans a satellite party for the Scranton branch. Meanwhile, Dwight competes against the website t...

Episodes.Title: Money
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: As Jan renovates the condo, Michael confronts his growing debt every way he can, which includes getting a second job. Pam and Jim spend a night out on Dwight's family beet farm, now a bed and breakfast.

Episodes.Title: Local Ad
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael tries to make a local Dunder Mifflin commercial that is better than the one the professional ad agency made for them. Meanwhile, Andy tries to confide in Dwight about his new relationship with Angela.

Episodes.Title: Branch Wars
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael and Dwight try to play a prank on Karen, who is now manager of the Utica branch, after she tries to steal Stanley from the Scranton office. Meanwhile, Pam, Toby, and Oscar start their own exclusive office book club.

Episodes.Title: Survivor Man
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Steve Carell, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: After Michael isn't invited to a camping trip with Ryan, he sets out to prove that he can brave it out in the wilderness by himself. Jim, who is in charge of the office while Michael is gone, tries to change the birthday party pol...

Episodes.Title: The Deposition
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Lester Lewis, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael is put in an awkward position when Jan sues Dunder Mifflin for wrongful termination and he is deposed as a witness. Kelly begins smack-talking Pam after Darryl beats Jim at ping-pong.

Episodes.Title: Dinner Party
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Gene Stupnitsky, Lee Eisenberg
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael invites Jim and Pam and Andy and Angela to a couples-only dinner party, where they witness Michael and Jan's extremely dysfunctional home life. Dwight finds a way to invite himself, too.

Episodes.Title: Chair Model
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Kevin and Andy team up to reclaim the stolen Dunder Mifflin parking spaces, which forces them into a showdown with the other four bosses of the office park. Meanwhile, Michael becomes fascinated by a woman modeling chairs in a cat...

Episodes.Title: Night Out
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael and Dwight go to New York to party with Ryan, who is having lots of personal and professional problems. The rest of the office employees work late, and wind up getting locked in the business park.

Episodes.Title: Did I Stutter?
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Justin Spitzer
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael tries to figure out how to respond to Stanley's insubordination during a meeting, and Dwight buys Andy's vehicle and immediately flips it for more money.

Episodes.Title: Job Fair
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Lee Eisenberg, Gene Stupnitsky
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Dunder Mifflin participates in a high school job fair, but few students are interested. Jim, Andy, and Kevin play a round of golf with a prospective client. Back at the office, everyone but Dwight and Angela leave for the day.

Episodes.Title: Goodbye, Toby
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Jennifer Celotta, Paul Lieberstein
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael throws an extravagant going-away party for Toby, and falls in love with the woman who is replacing him. Jim plans to propose to Pam at the party, but gets out-staged. Back at corporate, Ryan is arrested for fraud.
